duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for the management and supervision of all areas assigned by the Store Manager and follows policies in regard to Customers, Associates and merchandising.
In the absence of the Store Manager, the Assistant Manager is responsible for leading the entire operation of the Store to ensure that Company standards and best practices are consistently met.
Assists in the analysis of Store reports to evaluate controllable expenses and overall Store performance.
Ensures proper scheduling of Associates to meet business objectives.
Assists with recruiting, hiring, training and developing non-exempt Associates.
Controls payroll hours to plan, as the primary controllable expense, as well as adjusting to current business trends.
Understands that safety is the number one priority and practices safe behaviors in everything they do.
Maintains adherence to Company safety policies and ensures the safety of Associates and Customers.
Executes Customer service programs and Merchandise Presentation programs through Associate training and program supervision.
Represents and supports the Company brand at all times.
Urgently manages merchandise processing to the sales floor within the expected Company timeframe.
Assists with training Associates on Loss Prevention awareness and Store shortage goals.
Understands and complies with the Loss Prevention Awareness Program and is responsible for Store Loss Prevention.
Direct supervision of all non-exempt Associates.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Retail Management, or related field
